amendment.description: Amendment makes permanent the exception to the PHA resident board member requirement.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 7 printed in House Report 114-411 to make permanent the exception to public housing agency resident board member requirement.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Palazzo amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 236 - 178 (Roll no. 50).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
